CustomField.formula: IF(SBQQ__Quote__r.Display_Add_on_and_Warranty_Price__c, IF(ISBLANK(SBQQ__ProductOption__c), Total_Package_Price_Freight__c, SBQQ__NetTotal__c), IF(AND(ISBLANK(SBQQ__ProductOption__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, 'Warranty'))), Total_Package_Price_Freight__c, SBQQ__NetTotal__c) )
CustomField.label: Dynamic Net Total
